mhs.src.storage.persistence.remote

Class GoogleCalendar

  • java.lang.Object
    • mhs.src.storage.persistence.remote.GoogleCalendar

  • public class GoogleCalendar
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the methods to interface with a user's Google Calendar It supports single event functions such as: creation, retrieval, updating and deletion It also supports multiple event functions such as retrieving or deleting all events within a specified time range
    Author:
    John Wong

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String createCalendar(java.lang.String calTitle)
      check if calendar with calendar title is in user's Google Calendar, else create a calendar based on specified calendar title
